    • ArtFacade

      public ArtFacade​(Art art, ArtManager artManager)
      A facade used for interacting with the art object
      Parameters:
      art - the target Art object
      artManager - the ArtManager used

  • Method Details

    • getAsciiArt

      public java.lang.String getAsciiArt()
      Retrieves the ASCII data of this art piece
      Returns:
      a String of the ASCII characters that make up this piece

    • getTitle

      public java.lang.String getTitle()
      Retrieves the title of this piece
      Returns:
      a String of this piece's title

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      Retrieves the price of this piece
      Returns:
      a double of this piece's price

    • getTradeable

      public boolean getTradeable()
      Get whether the art is tradable
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if this art is public/tradeable

    • getId

      public java.util.UUID getId()
      Get the ID of this art
      Returns:
      a UUID
